checkInvariants(address).details: This should be called before onlyUnpaused, in case contracts are paused then pause check must happen after.Emits `InvariantsHold` event if invariants hold.

params.poolToCheck: The LeveragedPool contract to be checked.

constructor.details: Throws if factory address is null

devdoc.title: The contract for checking invariants and pausing if necessary

checkInvariants(address).notice: Checks all invariants, and pauses all contracts if         any invariant does not hold.

userdoc.notice: Every time certain functions are called, known invariants are checked and if any do not hold, contracts are paused.
